casebody.data:
David HOWARD, Appellant-Defendant,
v.
STATE of Indiana, Appellee-Plaintiff. Court of Appeals Case No. 49A02-1704-CR-752 Court of Appeals of Indiana. FILED November 15, 2017

DISPOSITION OF CASE BY UNPUBLISHED MEMORANDUM DECISION

DARDEN , Sr.J. Affirmed in part, reversed in part and remanded with instructions. CRONE, J., Concurs.

ALTICE, J., Concurs.
